text:
Here are multiple fixes to issues that I found during implementation of OAuth 1.0. RequestValidator in my project.
- added missing methods in list of methods to implement (RequesrValidator class docstring)
- updated docstrings of some methods. This relates mostly to issues that were "documented" only on issue tracker (#185, #202) and should be explained in docs.
- added example implementation of `validate_realms`
title: OAuth1.0 RequestValidator multiple docs fixes

title: OAuth1.0 RequestValidator multiple docs fixes
Pull request merge from swistakm/oauthlib:fix/oauth1-request-validator-docs-fixes to idan/oauthlib:master

text: Really nice work @swistakm, awesome to have some fresh eyes on the docs :)
docs: add missing method mentions in oauth1.rfc5849.request_validator.RequestValidator docstring
docs: add missing method usage info in oauth1 RequestValidator.get_realms() docstring

docs: add more verbose docstring in oauth1 RequestValidator methods

- add link to Section 2.3 RFC 5849 that explains why there is a need for
  token invalidation and give a clue how it can be invalidated (refs #202)
- add example implementation of validate_realms
- explain why `verify_request_token` does not double functionality of
  `validate_request_token` (refs #185)
